Name: Average time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average time from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR to Request Payment
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Total time spent on Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR and the end of the case

Name: Minimum time taken for Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR to be followed by any approval activity
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average time for Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR in cases where Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION precedes it
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and the end of case where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION occurs

Name: Total resolution time of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR in the most frequent process variant
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and the end of case where activity 'most frequent process variant occurs

Name: Average waiting time before Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR after Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Minimum time from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR to Payment Handled in cases where Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR directly follows
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average time it takes from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR to the next activity in the process
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR and the end of the case

Name: Total time for Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR in cases ending with Payment Handled
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Payment Handled'
